Comments_List: With this course I learned a lot about French culture, and the social values upon which French society relies. My oral skills enhanced incredibly, and my vocabulary was broadened in many topics.
My vocabulary and knowledge of french history and current events increased due to this corse.
Vocabularyand content related to french culture including work, education, and politics.
My speaking improved and I learned a lot about French culture.

Oral skills (minimal), comprehension skills, much more knowledge about french culture (i.e. food, school system, relationship between rural/agricultural areas, approaches to sex/sexuality, role in the EU, progressive/conservative politics)
I improved my accent and learned a lot of new vocabulary.

The course is organized in such a way that all students learn. The written assignments are great for learning the vocabulary and practicing grammar, and the structure of the class allows everyone to participate as much as they wish.
Readings were interesting and I enjoyed our conversations.
we can have more writing assignments
I would certainly recommend this course to any student who is interested in learning more about France and practicing oral skills in French.
Yes, because I found the professor good and the course well organized.
Yes, I really enjoyed this class.
Yeah- it really helps with speaking and you learn a lot about France. I did miss reading French literature though.
